data.title: Gul Khan (producer)
data.text:
Indian producer, writer and director (born 1974)

Gul Khan (born 5 March 1974) is an Indian producer, writer and director known for producing shows like Geet, Qubool Hai, Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon?, Ishqbaaaz, Kullfi Kumarr Bajewala, Nazar, Yehh Jadu Hai Jinn Ka!, Imlie, Ishk Par Zor Nahi and Aashiqana. She is co-creative head and co-producer of 4 Lions Films.[1]

Early and personal life

[edit]

Khan has studied in Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi.[2] She is married to Gorky M.[2]
